items.name: Atziri's Promise
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 8% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."
- Atziri, Queen of the Vaal

items.name: Nebulis
explicitMods: 15% increased Cast Speed
20% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%
20% increased Lightning Damage per 1% Lightning Resistance above 75%
flavourText: The vastness of the cosmos holds energies beyond comprehension,
should one have the fortitude to grasp them.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 100% increased Experience
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants additional energy shield and increased energy shield recharge rate to you and your allies.
explicitMods: 10% increased Area of Effect
You and nearby allies gain 60 additional Energy Shield
You and nearby Allies gain 30% increased Energy Shield Recharge Rate
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
Modifiers to Buff Duration also apply to this Skill's Soul Gain Prevention
10% increased Area of Effect
Your and nearby allies' Energy Shield Recharges are not delayed by Damage
hybrid.secDescrText: Casts a temporary aura that prevents energy shield recharge being delayed by damage taken for you and your allies.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 64% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Has 2 Sockets
Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
8% increased Attack Speed
+69 to maximum Life
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: Midnight tinkering begets midday murdering;
a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Brood Spur
enchantMods: Adds 1 to 160 Lightning Damage if you haven't Killed Recently
explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill
+26 to Intelligence
+48 to maximum Energy Shield
+27% to Fire Resistance
30% increased Movement Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff which adds lightning damage to spells and attacks. If you kill a shocked enemy, this skill will create a storm, causing lightning bolts to strike enemies around you for a duration. The damage inflicted by this skill is not affected by modifiers to spell damage.
explicitMods: Deals 26 to 1230 Lightning Damage
Cannot inflict Shock
Base duration is 6.00 seconds
Storm Hits an Enemy every 0.25 Seconds
Creates a storm when you Kill a Shocked Enemy
Buff grants 20 to 81 Added Attack Lightning Damage
Buff grants 20 to 81 Added Spell Lightning Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff providing fire damage based on your physical damage. While you have this buff, if you kill an enemy, other enemies near them will be burned based on the overkill damage. The burn inflicted by this skill can only be affected by modifiers to damage over time (burning damage is damage over time).
explicitMods: Base duration is 4.00 seconds
Base Burning Damage is 25% of Overkill Damage
38% more Burning Damage
Buff grants 15% of your Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage
Buff grants 15% increased Fire Damage
Buff grants 12% more Spell Fire Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: +65 to Maximum Charges
Loses all Charges when you enter a new area
Consumes Maximum Charges to use

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "What care have I for their pain? They're already dead."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

items.name: Southbound
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: Adds 69 to 100 Cold Damage to Attacks
14% increased maximum Life
+48% to Cold Resistance
100% increased Freeze Duration on Enemies
Your Hits can only Kill Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Far south, the winter crawls under the skin.
Below the snow, adrift wanderers sleep.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that affects you and nearby enemies differently depending on your stance. Using the skill again alternates between Blood Stance and Sand Stance.
explicitMods:
Nearby Enemies are Blinded while in Sand Stance
You take 16% less Damage from Attacks from Enemies that aren't nearby while in Sand Stance
Nearby Enemies are Maimed while in Blood Stance
53% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Buff grants 10% increased Evasion Rating and Armour
Enemies Maimed by this Skill take 12% increased Physical Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Eagle Rosary
explicitMods: +25% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+15% to all Elemental Resistances
32% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills
+1 to Level of all Physical Skill Gems
flavourText: It's said to be noble to stand one's ground.
To soak the earth in stalwart blood.
While the First Ones chose to laugh and run
and caper with untamed glee.
- The Wolven King

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +19 to Intelligence
20% increased Lightning Damage
32% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: Forged by three brothers
so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

52% increased Armour during Effect

items.name: Bottled Faith
explicitMods: 29% reduced Duration
Consecrated Ground created by this Flask has Tripled Radius

149% increased Critical Strike Chance against Enemies on Consecrated Ground during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A tourniquet for the soul, squeezing ethereal into physical.

items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: +19 to all Attributes
7% increased Movement Speed
50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You are Cursed with Vulnerability
flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

items.name: Eber's Unification
explicitMods: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill
170% increased Energy Shield
+54 to maximum Mana
50% increased Stun and Block Recovery
Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
flavourText: The impediments of flesh are weak.
The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.
